StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Center for Craniofacial and Dental Genetics (CCDG): Genetics of Orofacial Clefts, Sub-types, and Subclinical Phenotypes - CIDR

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: Approved users should acknowledge that funding for the original study and data generation was provided by National Institutes of Health (NIH) grants R01DE016148 (Marazita, Weinberg) R37DE008559 (Murray), and R00DE022378 (Butali), and Robert Wood Johnson Foundation AMFDP Grant 72429. Genotyping services (grant X01HG011437, Shaffer, Marazita) were provided by the Center for Inherited Disease Research (CIDR), funded through a federal contract from the NIH to the Johns Hopkins University (HHSN268201700006I). Funds for genotyping and data cleaning/quality assurance were provided by the NIDCR through CIDR's NIH contract. The acknowledgment statement should include the dbGaP accession number to the specific version of the dataset(s) analyzed.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Orofacial birth defects and related phenotypes, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OBDR-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Orofacial birth defects and related phenotypes and related disorders.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Craniofacial Research, IRB, COL)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CFR-IRB-COL
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Craniofacial Research. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical
ConsentGroup.name: HMB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Orofacial birth defects and related phenotypes, MDS, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OBDR-MDS-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Orofacial birth defects and related phenotypes and related disorders. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

StudyTo.name: dbGaP Collection: Compilation of Individual-Level Genomic Data for General Research Use
